credit_line: Gift of Katzenbach and Warren, Inc.
title: Mural Scrolls
description: Mural miniatures of large-scale wall decorations designed especially for silk screen reproduction by the artists Calder, Matisse, Matta and Miro. They are entitled respectively, "A Piece of My Workshop", "Arbre en Fleur", "Sun Dice" and "El Sol." Originally part of a samplebook with information on the artists. Each print is attached to a stiff piece of burlap.
name: Sample book
